title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 100.1 - Explanatory note
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 100.1 - Explanatory note

State Regulations

Section
96
(12)
of the Banking Law authorizes banks and
trust companies to acquire and lease personal property or acquire personal
property subject to an existing lease together with the lessor's interest
therein, subject to such regulations as may be imposed by the
superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
100.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
